name: web-streams-polyfill
description: Web Streams, based on the WHATWG spec reference implementation

scripts.test: (cd spec/reference-implementation ; npm install && npm run test)
scripts.bundle:min: browserify -g uglifyify index.es6.js -d -s default -t [ babelify uglifyify ] -d | exorcist ./dist/polyfill.min.js.map > ./dist/polyfill.min.js
scripts.build: rm -rf spec && git clone https://github.com/whatwg/streams.git && mv ./streams ./spec && npm run bundle

author: Diwank Singh <diwank.singh@gmail.com>
